effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,474 Parry and 3,181 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 76,845 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,269 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 814,009 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 1,954, up to 9,774.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.3 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
